inclusion.criterion: patients with heart failure and reduced ejection fraction (LVEF < 45%) due to ischemic or hypertensive heart disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: moderate to severe central sleep apnea/cheyne stokes respiration.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: treatment should be stable for the last 30 days preceding entry into the study.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: cardiac surgery/transient ischemic attack/stroke/resynchronization therapy within 3 months
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has COPD, OSA and obesity hypoventilation syndrome. Daughter reports increased agitation and altered mental status x 2-3 days with O2 sats 60s-70s at home.
